author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Apache Midstream And Arm Energy Announce Development Of Salt Creek Midstream’S SCM Alpine
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Apache Midstream:
* APACHE MIDSTREAM AND ARM ENERGY HOLDINGS ANNOUNCE DEVELOPMENT OF SALT CREEK MIDSTREAM’S SCM ALPINE, LLC
* APACHE MIDSTREAM - SIGNS OPTION FOR 50% STAKE IN 445,000 BBL/D NGL HEADER SYSTEM
* APACHE MIDSTREAM - CONSTRUCTION HAS COMMENCED, AND PROJECT IS EXPECTED TO BE OPERATIONAL IN Q1 2019 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
